title: Newcomer's €51,438 Win at BitStarz takes "Beginners Luck" to a Whole New Level
text:
BitStarz
SLIEMA, Malta , October 20, 2015 /PRNewswire/ --
Lucky newcomer couldn't believe her eyes as she saw a €200 deposit turn into a massive €51,438.47 win. The unbelievable winning streak lasted over 48 hours as she landed big win upon big win
on some of the most popular games in the casino. Talk about beginner's luck!
(Photo: http://photos.prnewswire.com/prnh/20151019/278071 )
We're all familiar with the concept "Beginner's Luck", but never has that expression been used better than to describe the massive winning streak by one of the new casino players at BitStarz.
After a quick sign-up, Rebecca saw her initial €200 deposit increase to a whopping €51,438.47, something most people could only dream of.
The lucky player explored BitStarz fantastic range of games and managed to land win upon win. The largest single win during her sessions was an astronomical €16,500 win on the ever so popular super slot, Supernova. However, other games such as Playboy, Goldilocks and Jurassic Park paid out quite generously too, with wins totaling almost €35,000!
The Marketing Manager of BitStarz, Sasha Jade commented, -
" It ' s great for BitStarz to bring forward such happy moments, but even better to be acknowledged for such a juicy payout. We work extremely hard to deliver online entertainment with big payouts and the fastest withdrawals. Such wins go straight to what we hope to offer our customer, a place where they can " Dream Big, Win Bigger " - which just became reality for a lucky player. "
We managed to get a few words from the winner and asked to share her feelings. As one can imagine, Rebecca was over the moon and could only express her happiness in a few words: "I can hardly believe it! After my first and single deposit on the casino I hit this big! I have never won anything, this is amazing! " . T he lucky winner mentioned she's going to put the money in her children's college fund.
* * *
